It's 3 tons.  Compared to the USI-LS Greenhouse, it's 6x the mass using 3x the EC, 5x the Mulch, and 5x the Fertilizer to product 5x the Supplies of the USI-LS greenhouse.  IIRC, the hab values on the KBPS parts were 100% in-line with RoverDude's guidelines, but the Greenhouse is definitely off by a bit.

The rub is that he has it as \*both\* a recycler \*and\* a hab multiplier.  Which = 7.5t of mass to be balanced with the other single-use parts.  Converters are generally a wash when bundled with recycler mass.

If it was just a recycler or just a hab multiplier, the number would of course be half.  Either 3t or 3.5t.
